name: Artif
description:
THIS GAME ONLY WEIGHTS 3KB! (source code only, full compiled version is 50mb :c) You can run it on an calculator! (only if recoded for one)

Game made almost entirely by an AI.

Playground on OpenAI used for this.

Open source and free to edit and distribute in case. Please fix this game, because the enemy only goes in a 1 dimensional space.

Usable with linux (if with Wine)
